attributes.action: reverse the decision to increase the cost of a visa for touring cultural groups
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Boyan Ensemble of Kiev tour the UK in support of their choir, which no longer receives state funding. They have brought their beautiful music to this country annually for the past sixteen years. This much-loved activity is now under threat due to the decision by the UK Government to class the choir as foreign workers and substantially increase the cost of the entry visa required.
